      Methods in com.soa.message.handler with parameters of type MessageContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ChainHandler.close(MessageContext context)
      Closes all configured handlers.
      void MessageHandler.close(MessageContext context)
      Called by the framework after each handleMessage() call to allow the handler to release any resources.
      boolean ChainHandler.handleMessage(MessageContext context)
      Invokes the configured handlers in order.
      boolean MessageHandler.handleMessage(MessageContext context)
      Gives the handler a message and context to operate on.

    • Uses of MessageContext in com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler

      Methods in com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler with parameters of type MessageContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List PolicyHandlerUtil.getPolicyChoices(MessageContext context)
      Returns a List of ChoiceIdentifiers from the given MessageContext, if any.
      static void PolicyHandlerUtil.setPolicyChoices(MessageContext context, java.util.List choices)
      Associates a List of ChoiceIdentifiers with the given MessageContext.

      protected abstract ChoiceAwareResult ChoiceAwarePolicyHandler.selectPoliciesAndHandleMessage(MessageContext context, java.util.List policyChoices)
      Select the policy based on the underlying SOAP message and process the message based on the selected one(s).
